1. Pre-Requisites¶

1.1. Install relevant applications and libraries¶

  1. Install Docker here.

  2. Install Visual Studio Code here.

  3. Install Node.js here. -Tested using node.js LTS version: 16.15.0-

1.2. Configure to allow virtualization¶

How to check if virtualization is enabled?
1. Open up task manager (Ctrl + Alt + Del)
2. Go to Performance Tab
3. Check Virtualization whether its enabled

  1. If it is disabled, proceed to How to enable virtualization.

  2. Else proceed to Enabling Hypervisor/HyperV on Windows

1.3. Enabling Hypervisor/HyperV on Windows¶

  1. Search “Turn Windows features on and off” in windows search

  2. Check Windows Hypervisor platform / Check HyperV

  3. Restart Computer
